page.title: 07WEST CHELTENHAM
page.content: Hesters Way - this name is said to have{supernatural}connections. Hester, a 12 year-old girl, is supposed to haunt this area having fallen down a well and died. 80% of the area is{housing,}most of it Council-owned flats. There are four churches here, three C of E and one modern RC with its roof depicting a crown of thorns.{ Secondary{education}is about to be re-organised. The boys' Grammar School will become co-educational, Arle Comprehensive will lose its Sixth form and Monkscroft Secondary Modern is to be moved to make room for a Sixth Form College. Besides 186 allotments there is a garden centre,wholesale fruit supplier and a bonded warehouse. Light{industry includes paint sprayers,glider equip- ment and hydraulic works.
